Title: AD FS 2.x PowerShell Tools
Description:
This project is a place to put several AD FS 2.x related PowerShell scripts. 

Mostly used for automation & troubleshooting.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project is a place to put several AD FS 2.x related PowerShell scripts.

Mostly used for automation & troubleshooting.

PowerShell Utilities for AD FS 2.0

  • Lacking a good source of AD FS 2.x scripts/utilities, I decided to dive in and write my own.
Many of these scripts are specific to my needs, but most can easily be adapted to anyone's needs.

I am not an experienced PowerShell programmer. I am novice at best.

If you have suggestions to improve these scripts, PLEASE feel free to post/ask questions/make suggestions.

Thanks!
